name: The Grand Finale (prestosilver)
description:
Super early release for a game Ive been working on, working on rewriting the engine, download the prototype release to test.

Goal

Clockwork cycle game kinda like Majora's mask, but without the restarting, so like you can save as often as you want, but not only can you save, you can re do portions of your save to save time. Kind of like segmented speed runs.
